trans-unit.source: An abstract container class that, when implemented by several of its static properties, contains version information for security components.
This class is the extensibility point for customizing token serialization.

This class is a singleton that provides information about the versions of the security specifications, (WS-Security, WS-Trust, WS-Secure Conversation and WS-Security Policy), that must be supported by a binding.
The class contains seven `static` properties, each of which returns an instance of this class.
Each of these properties represents a different combination of security specification versions.
The instances of this class are used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.
If you pass the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.Default%2A> property, you create a standard version of the binding element.
To create a non-standard version, pass the property that matches your version.
The class also contains `abstract` properties that are implemented by the previous instances.
Gets the version information for the Basic Security Profile.
This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions, and so returns a different value for this property.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.BasicSecurityProfileVersion"></xref> object.
Gets the version information for default message security.
The default security specifications are WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1.
This static property returns an instance of this class.
The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion"></xref> object that represents the default message security.
Gets the WS-SecureConversation version that corresponds to the message security version.
This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecureConversationVersion"></xref> object that corresponds to the message security version.
Gets the WS-SecurityPolicy version that corresponds to the message security version.
This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityPolicyVersion"></xref> object that corresponds to the message security version.
Gets the security token version that corresponds to the message security version.
This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

This property is used to query a token serializer factory interface defined in <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion> for a token serializer instance capable of serializing tokens.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion"></xref> object that corresponds to the message security version.
Gets the WS-Security version that corresponds to the message security version.
This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityVersion"></xref> object that corresponds to the message security version.
Gets the WS-Trust version that corresponds to the message security version.
This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.TrustVersion"></xref> object that corresponds to the message security version.
Gets the message security version that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.
This static property returns an instance of this class.
The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion"></xref> object that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.

Gets the message security version that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.
This static property returns an instance of this class.
The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion"></xref> object that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.
Gets the message security version that requires the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.
This static property returns an instance of this class.
The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion"></xref> object that requires the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.
Gets the message security version that requires the WS-Security1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and BasicSecurityProfile 1.0 security specifications.
This static property returns an instance of this class.
The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion"></xref> object that requires the WS-Security1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and BasicSecurityProfile 1.0 security specifications.
Gets the message security version that requires the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.
This static property returns an instance of this class.
The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion"></xref> object that requires the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.

Gets the message security version that requires the Basic Security Profile based on WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.
This static property returns an instance of this class.
The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion"></xref> object that requires the Basic Security Profile based on WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.
